title: New International Anglicised Version
description:
The New International Version (NIV) is a completely original translation of the Bible developed by more than one hundred scholars working from the best available Hebrew, Aramaic, and Greek texts. This version of the NIV is intended for British readers.
Holy Bible, New International Version®, Anglicised, NIV®
